# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

# Define the function `wrap_string` which takes a string `text` as input
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    output = ""
    current_length = 0

    for word in words
        current_length += length(word) + 1  # Add 1 for the space after each word
        
        if current_length > text_width
            output *= "\n$word "
            current_length = length(word) + 1
        else
            output *= "$word "
        end
    end

    return output
end

# Test the function with the provided data
wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines") # Output should be wrapped based on a text width of 10 or default value of 10
